alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 03 at 4:52PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Jackson Hole. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel over open areas of Grand Teton National Park and locations south and west of Jackson could be impacted by the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There will be a lull in the snowfall this morning before snow increases again this afternoon and evening. Warming temperatures may hinder snow accumulations this afternoon. For forecast snowfall images, go to weather.gov/riverton/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
